name: Deadly Thunder (C64)
description:
UPDATED: New Title Screen, Hi-Score Table, Music on Title Screen, Small code Fixes.

A Game for TheC64Maxi/C64Mini/Commodore 64 or a Good C64 Emulator.

1 Player Game.

Arcade Style Fake 2.5D Sideways Heli-Copter Shoot 'em' up, Made with Shoot 'Em' Up Construction Kit by Sensible Software and Jon Wells, Seuck framework Code by Richard Bayliss.
